abstract: Barbara Sheehan, Queens woman who killed her husband, shooting him 11 times, but was acquitted of his murder, will be eligible for release again on $1 million bail pending her sentencing on weapons conviction.
snippet: Barbara Sheehan, a Queens woman who killed her husband but was acquitted of his murder, will be eligible for release again on $1 million bail pending her sentencing on a weapons conviction.
lead_paragraph: Barbara Sheehan, a Queens woman who killed her husband but was acquitted of his murder, will be eligible for release again on $1 million bail pending her sentencing on a weapons conviction.

headline.main: Not Guilty of Murder; Facing $1 Million Bail
headline.print_headline: Not Guilty of Murder; Facing $1 Million Bail
headline.seo: Bail Set for Barbara Sheehan, Acquitted of Murder but Guilty of Weapons Charge
